AccountSettings.name: AccountSettings
AccountSettings.label: Account Settings
AccountSettings.description: Represents AccountSettings metadata component used in Salesforce deployments and package development.

FullName.description: The unique identifier for this metadata component

enableAccountHistoryTracking.description: enable Account History Tracking field of AccountSettings metadata component.

enableAccountInsightsInMobile.description: enable Account Insights In Mobile field of AccountSettings metadata component.

enableAccountOwnerReport.description: enable Account Owner Report field of AccountSettings metadata component.

enableAccountTeams.description: enable Account Teams field of AccountSettings metadata component.

enableContactHistoryTracking.description: enable Contact History Tracking field of AccountSettings metadata component.

enableRelateContactToMultipleAccounts.description: enable Relate Contact To Multiple Accounts field of AccountSettings metadata component.

showViewHierarchyLink.description: show View Hierarchy Link field of AccountSettings metadata component.
